name: Following Mama
description:
Small game made for the Untitled Game Jam #37, with the theme "Duck" in mind.

This is my first game ever, so I wanted to created something really small and take the time to familiarize myself with the Godot Engine.

As I focused on the "tech" side, art has not been a priority for this jam, so the duck and the ducklings are symbolised with colored squares.

Controls :

  • Move : Arrow keys
  • Retry the current level : R

Credits :

  • Development : MrBramard
  • Music : wyver9 (https://opengameart.org/users/wyver9)
